languages.text: Вы узнали у Бахвала на Райкади Филия кодовую фразу для Риззы с Футфолла.
You learned the code phrase for Ryzza of Footfall from Bakhval on Rykadi Philia.
languages.original_text: Вы узнали у Бахвала на Райкади Филия кодовую фразу для Риззы с Футфолла.

traits.locale_text: You learned the code phrase for Ryzza of Footfall from Bakhval on Rykadi Philia.
You let the pirates leave Rykadi Philia alive.

languages.text: Sur Rykadi Philia, Bakhval vous a appris la phrase codée destinée à Ryzza de Castel.
languages.original_text: You learned the code phrase for Ryzza of Footfall from Bakhval on Rykadi Philia.

traits.locale_text: Sur Rykadi Philia, Bakhval vous a appris la phrase codée destinée à Ryzza de Castel.

languages.text: Bakhval en Rykadi Philia te enseñó la clave para Ryzza de Paso.
languages.original_text: You learned the code phrase for Ryzza of Footfall from Bakhval on Rykadi Philia.

traits.locale_text: Bakhval en Rykadi Philia te enseñó la clave para Ryzza de Paso.

languages.text: 海賊に生きてライカディ・フィリアを脱出させました。
languages.original_text: You let the pirates leave Rykadi Philia alive.

traits.locale_text: 海賊に生きてライカディ・フィリアを脱出させました。

languages.text: 你从莱卡德菲利亚星的巴卡瓦那里得到了密语，可以说给落脚港的莱萨。
languages.original_text: You learned the code phrase for Ryzza of Footfall from Bakhval on Rykadi Philia.

traits.locale_text: 你从莱卡德菲利亚星的巴卡瓦那里得到了密语，可以说给落脚港的莱萨。

languages.text: Ihr habt die Codes für Ryzza auf Footfall von Bakhval auf Rykadi Philia erhalten.
languages.original_text: You learned the code phrase for Ryzza of Footfall from Bakhval on Rykadi Philia.

traits.locale_text: Ihr habt die Codes für Ryzza auf Footfall von Bakhval auf Rykadi Philia erhalten.

languages.text: Rykadi Philia'daki Bakhval'dan Binlimanlı Ryzza'da işe yarayacak parolayı öğrendin.
languages.original_text: You learned the code phrase for Ryzza of Footfall from Bakhval on Rykadi Philia.

traits.locale_text: Rykadi Philia'daki Bakhval'dan Binlimanlı Ryzza'da işe yarayacak parolayı öğrendin.
